web_snippets: Michael Murray (born March 31, 1932) is an American stage director, producer and educator. He is one of the early leaders of the Regional Theatre Movement.
Michael Murray is the Spears Gilbert Associate Professor of Law. He has been teaching full time at the College of Law since his appointment in 2018.
